summary: Integration test suite for Conan's v2 'list' command, exercising binary filtering, compact and HTML output, handling of user/channel omission, preferences, references, remote repositories, and various parameter error scenarios, along with supporting test utilities.
business_intent: Validate and safeguard the correctness and robustness of the Conan package manager's listing functionality across diverse configurations and edge cases, ensuring reliable user experience and developer confidence.
